title: Anthony Anderson Interview
itunes:title: Anthony Anderson Interview
description:
Today on the show comedian Anthony Anderson called in and spoke about Black-ish legacy, telling black stories and so much more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a prinicple who does not understand the importance of the black lives matter movement, and you will definitely be surprised what race she is. Also, Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee" especially with one listener that needed rescue from an abusive situation.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
